text: Søren Andkjer Jensen (born 7 November 1942) is a former Danish handball player who competed in the 1972 Summer Olympics. He played his club handball with Efterslægten. In 1972 he was part of the Danish team which finished thirteenth in the Olympic tournament. He played four matches and scored one goal. ==External links== *Sports-Reference profile Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Danish male handball players Category:Olympic handball players of Denmark Category:Handball players at the 1972 Summer Olympics
title: Søren Jensen (handballer)
